title: The Hobbit

description: A fantasy novel about the journey of a hobbit named Bilbo Baggins.

author: George Orwell
description: A dystopian novel about totalitarianism and surveillance.

description: A thought-provoking book on the evolution of humans.

title: Dune

description: An epic science fiction novel set on the desert planet Arrakis.

description: A classic novel about racial injustice in the Deep South.

description: A visionary sci-fi series about the fall and rise of civilizations.

title: The Selfish Gene
author: Richard Dawkins

author: Jane Austen
description: A romantic novel that critiques the British landed gentry.

description: A cyberpunk novel that pioneered ideas about cyberspace.

description: The official biography of Apple co-founder Steve Jobs.

description: The memoir of former First Lady Michelle Obama.

description: A gothic horror novel introducing Count Dracula.

description: A terrifying novel about a shape-shifting evil entity.

description: The diary of a Jewish girl hiding during the Holocaust.

description: Adventures of the world's most famous detective.
